name: Student Taught Courses (StuCo): The Ultimate Heavy Metal Class
long_desc: An introduction to the Heavy Metal music genre that includes its history, culture, and subgenres.

custom_fields.goals: Students will be able to identify different metal genres and learn about the deep cultural impact of heavy metal.
custom_fields.key_topics:
Sub-genres such as thrash metal, black metal, power metal, etc.
Fashion
Fan culture
Lyrical themes that may include but will not be restricted to religion, literature, and history.
custom_fields.relevance: It revolves around heavy metal, which has remained a popular music genre for more than 40 years among young people.
custom_fields.extra_time_commitment: About 10-20 minutes of extra commitment per class.
